rows.label: tlk41400071_02_msg0001
rows.name:
So APPARENTLY the bigwigs are
having some kind of meeting to put
an end to the war peacefully.

rows.label: tlk41400071_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I just can't see the conflict really
ending, not as long as there are
Blades in the world.

rows.label: tlk41400071_02_msg0003
rows.name:
You may as well be walking around
toting weapons in everyone's faces.

rows.label: tlk41400071_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Down with Blades! We'll never have
true peace until we rid the world of
Blades completely!
